website_summaries.verdict: This option looks great and will keep you very warm, although if you're right on the line between sizes, you'll want to order up.
pros: Available in a few different color combinations
Fabric and stitching are high quality
Suit is easy to get on
Gives you a lot of freedom of motion
cons: Some buyers claim it runs a little small
Some of them have a strong, lingering odor
The zipper on the back unzips itself in large waves

customer_reviews.title: Worst wetsuit I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Worst wetsuit I’ve ever owned. I’ve been surfing for 10 years, and this is by far the worst even for a cheap suit. Immediately flushes with water at all the seams, and the back zip unzips completely at times when duck diving larger waves. I even felt compelled to call Oneill, and they told me it was more or less my fault for buying their low end suit. I am shocked this wetsuit received such a good rating on Amazon. I would recommend buying the quicksilver syncro series if you are looking for an good affordable suit even if it’s a tad more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Mai Shu

customer_reviews.title: This suit smells like a skunk permanently.
customer_reviews.text: I read several comments that this wetsuit smells badly and i thought maybe they didnt know whay neoprine smells like. I was wrong, this suit has the worst skunk smell ever. It stinks up any room, bag, or trunk you try to put it in to mask the smell. No amount if washing ir treatment gets rid of it. It has something to so with what it was made of. Strongly recommend not buying this product. I cant believe such a brand name would keep selling it. They must have no sense of smell or they are fumling this product. Hate to think what the warehouse smells like where all if these are stored. Would give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality for Cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these, and the same issue happens on each...the zipper breaks. It's the situation where one side of the zipper dis-engages so that the zipper is only connected on one side, and doesn't 'zip' the two sides together. You can try all you want to fix it...it ain't gonna happen. This is a cheap wetsuit. If you surf, you'll want something better anyway...I was just trying to cheap-out, but need to spend the cash for a real fullsuit. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mar-Mat

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a big guy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so full disclosure, this is my first wetsuit. So, I'm no expert. But i am a big guy and I was worried about finding something that would actually fit me. I'm only 5' 11" but I'm 285 with a 50 inch chest. 19.5 inch neck and really wide shoulders. I went with this suit because they had more size options. I bought a XXXXL in the short. Fit perfect. The back strap is long enough for me to zip up without help and it works great. Swam in 60 degree water and felt warm. Very flexible and easy to move in (I'm learning how to kite board). Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul-Henry Zottola

customer_reviews.title: SUPER VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the price point. I am a big boy and the size chart actually included measurements that would help me get a better fit. I played in water to 65F and spent a good amount of time there enough to test the suit against that temp I am a wimp when it comes to cold water and was very comfortable when it was time to go up. further even after i was done in the water I felt no need to remove the suit right a way and actually kept it on for my 1 hour drive home. and lastly I liked the suit so much I ordered another suit, a RED one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hello I brought this back in May to fix a hole in the 8foot end of my pool kept me warm if you remember in NJ back in May it was wet and cool and this suit kept me warm also I am 70 inches tall 230 and 36 inch waist and the suit fit great I brought the xxxlshort nice fit. I liked the suit so much I'm taking scuba lessons to get more use out it oh I also purchased the hood, gloves and booties my air source was a cut water hose it was a funny expedition more later good luck
customer_reviews.author: 8inchfeed

customer_reviews.title: Decent suit. Nice size for bigger guys.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice quality wetsuit. One of the only brands that carry a wetsuit my size. I ordered a 5xlt and it was a tad too long (6’6” 330lbs). Noticed during 1st use, it kept coming unzipped in the back, allowing cold water in. Upon inspection I noticed the zipper stitching was already coming undone (see review video). Not sure if this is why it was coming unzipped? I figure this is only going to get worse. Will try and return.
customer_reviews.author: Mimiqweem

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.... cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: 6'4" 190lbs. Large tall fit like a glove.... that's the best thing about this wetsuit. However one you head into 60 degree water you will soon realize why this wetsuit is only $100. The rush of cold water, oh joy. Other wetsuits I have that are 3:2 will at least block water from coming in,,, on this suit the seams are just not up to par with a quality suit. A 3:2 shouldn't be this cold in the calif spring. Definitely will be a good choice for summer but that is about it. You get what you pay for. A subpar cheaply made suit that will keep you warm in 70 degree water....
customer_reviews.author: Martido

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: The Large fits really well. Looks great. I am 175lbs, 5.11, good quality suit for the price. I have a similar Oneill wetsuit ( size M) which has over 200 dives under its belt and is 22 years old, still hanging together - my son is wearing it now (as it shrunk or I grew)..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I used this wetsuit for a week long field course ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this wetsuit for a week long field course in Bermuda. During this time the suit provided sufficient warmth as well as protection from abrasion and various stinging biota. I was not impressed that this suit was delivered to me with a hole in it (something I did not realize until I was gearing up for my first snorkel). Also, this suit had a rather peculiar smell that I couldn't seem to wash off myself or my clothes for quite some time....perhaps this is customary of wetsuits in this price range? Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a cold diver even in warm (80 - 82 degree) water, so I bought this wetsuit to go diving in Grand Cayman. I stayed warm during my dives and never chilled. It performed flawlessly, albeit I've not used it enough times yet to see how well it lasts long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Caretaker

customer_reviews.title: Although I have good O'Neil wetsuits
customer_reviews.text: Although I have good O'Neil wetsuits, this is not one of them. As soon as you touch it, you can tell it's a cheap wetsuit and not worth the $100+. I used it once and water came in from everywhere. The neck is also very unconfortable. I'm 6' and I weigh 175 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feeling cold? Grab this wetsuit then.
customer_reviews.text: The neck area is a little uncomfortable for me, and sometimes it’ll leave a small rash. It’s not a super big negative for me, as the wetsuit does its job and keeps me warm when I’m surfing in Santa Cruz or Capitola. This one is also on me but my zipper on the back keeps going back down(I may have ordered too small of a suit and I’m kinda chunky). Would buy again. The booties compliment this suit very well although you’ll have to purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Lemuel Jamorabon

customer_reviews.title: Great value, fit, comfort
customer_reviews.text: The 3/2 O’Neil Reactor wetsuit is a great product for the comfort, stitching, and ease of movement while wearing. The zipper in the back is not difficult to close, and can be done without assistance. The price was very reasonable compared to other wetsuits of similar quality. The only thing I would look for as an improvement to this suit would be zippered arm and leg ends. Not really a negative, just something that would make it even better! I have been using this primarily for spear-fishing.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: ONeill Reactor 3/2 Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd wetsuit that I purchased. The first 2 I had trouble getting into after following the recommended size chart. The ONeill wetsuit I followed based on my weight alone and went up one size I was able to wear which allowed me to ride my new jet ski around the cold SF Bay. The wetsuit 3/2 gave me protection and along with my flotation vest kept me warm. Although the suit is a bit longer around the arm sleeves and legs, it was fine and comfortable for the 6 hours I was wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: obetsr51

customer_reviews.title: The Zipper Broke
customer_reviews.text: I wore this suit about three times before the zipper broke off. Unfortunately it was outside of the window or returns so now I have a decorative wetsuit. To make matters worse, the zipper broke as I was standing at the shore about to go out on a 4-5 ft day in Jax Beach. Did I turn around and go home? You bet your Harry Tookus that I full-kooked it and took an ice bath to my upper back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Zipper On An Otherwise Nice Suit.
customer_reviews.text: The suit felt good. In San Diego waters it kept me warm enough the handful of times I used it. I'm giving it poor rating because it did not last. The zipper came off the wetsuit making it useless. Literally only lasted a handful of suit ups. I repaired the zipper and the key to zipping it up is to pull the string from a 3 o'clock position to a 12. That gets it past the snags.
customer_reviews.author: E-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and kept me warm while pulling out dock in northern Minnesota in the cooler fall water. I didn't buy any liner, so I put this on over a pair of swim trunks and bare skin...it was a little tough to get into place in certain places, but overall was quite comfy once I did. I'm thinkning this might be my liner for those lightweight waders in the spring that always seem to get a small hole, here or there.
customer_reviews.author: PBota

customer_reviews.title: Buy em. Size is everything.
customer_reviews.text: Just tried them out yesterday. Completely satisfied. It only cost a little more to go first class. I'm 5'7 1/2'', 175 lbs. I bought the LS, large short and the fit is perfect. arms and legs are tight, but not too. Used these in 62-64 degree water in SoCal. After the initial coolness, a little water entry from wave force actually felt refreshing. I bought these after buying another cheaper brand that wouldn't even zip up without help. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Les Scott

customer_reviews.title: low end suit but OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Low end suit with an OK rating. 47 years surfing and have owned very many wetsuits Positives: design and quality are OK mine did not stink like some have reported (smells normal) MT sizing was accurate for my 6-0, 150lb body easy to get in and out of Negatives: the seams DO leak neck fastener can come undone material is not very stretchy or soft suit will not keep you warm in cold water good for sun and jelly fish protection only I hope it lasts for a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for price. Red color looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I found this as a warehouse deal. I love this suit and the red color. The one I had originally was size XL. I lost weight, so I felt bad that I would have to buy new suit. I was very excited when I found this one new buy open package warehouse deal! This Large is the right fit for my current weight! 190 lbs, 5'9", 41" chest, 35.5" waist.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: FIT'S VERY GOOD AND COMFORTABLE...I AM ABLE TO MOVE EASILY...WOULD BUY IT AGAIN...GOOD QUALITY...
customer_reviews.author: Huey P. Galatas

customer_reviews.title: Wetsuit is great - beware of sizing
customer_reviews.text: If I waited for warm weather (and warm water) to paddle-board the lakes around the greater Seattle area, I'd only be paddling a few months out of the year. I got the wet suit to see if the 3MM would keep me warm enough to paddle for a few hours at a time in the winter, works perfectly. The only hiccup was I originally ordered a large (I'm 5-10, 175lbs.) thinking it would fit without being too tight....WRONG....I couldn't zip the back up as it was way to snug. I re-ordered an XL and that did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: David Meador

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner Suit
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wetsuit. It works great. It's going to add about four months of outdoor swimming capability (probably not Winter). If you're on the border line size-wise, get the next larger size, or you may not be able to zip the suit up. I swim in chlorinated water and rinse the suit after each use. I've had it for a month. It seems to be holding up well. The coldwater hood makes a huge difference in bottling in warmth. It also seems to run on the small side, size-wise, but that helps to seal water out.
customer_reviews.author: New User

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that it feels good and moves nicely
customer_reviews.text: Don't even think about wearing this suit in water under 58 degrees F. The seams leak. It's not that warm. The good news is that it feels good and moves nicely. Think of it as a spring suit or a shorty. For $100 it basically works. Perfect East Coast late spring suit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Baum

customer_reviews.title: Zipper comes undone during use
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the money, got me through a single season of heavy use but now needs repair. I am having the same problem that many of the other reviewers are having. The zipper will unzip during use. Then cold water pours in. I plan to attempt to fix this by adding some kind of zipper lock or something. This is not a problem a good wetsuit would have. I would recommend getting a wetsuit without this issue. Otherwise wetsuit works well.
customer_reviews.author: evan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: We were heading to Bermuda in December and were worried about getting in the water that time of year. Decided to try these and they worked great. Fit exactly as expected using the sizing chart. While I didn't feel "super warm" in the cold water, it definitely helped with the cold.
customer_reviews.author: RRMJR

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine in 48 air/58 water
customer_reviews.text: Spent a weekend wakesurfing with friends. Air was 48°F water was 58°F. It kept me pretty comfortable. It’s quite flexible too. My hands and feet got pretty chilled down, but everything inside the suit was good.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb McElhaney

customer_reviews.title: There's no good way to secure the zipper up at the neck
customer_reviews.text: The back zipper is constantly opening when I duck dive. This lets in a ton of cold water. There's no good way to secure the zipper up at the neck.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Pull Broke On Third Use
customer_reviews.text: Great fit !!! Loved this wet suit, I own several thicker wet suits, that I’ve had and used for years with rear zipper pulls. I was very disappointed this one broke after only the 3rd use .. in comparison my other wet suits have much more robust zippers, I’m going to try and take it to a shop maybe they can install a new zipper pull ..
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: Just an okay product. I have this to my husband for Christmas and it’s just an okay wet suit. Good value for the money. It keeps him somewhat warm in southern Cali beaches. It does it’s job.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: Try to find another option, sure there are plenty.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, I won’t give 1 star rating just because I used it for surf and it helped, but, overall, it is a poor quality product when compare to other wetsuits in the same price range. Even after months of use, the stitching on the neck gave me this annoying rash making sessions unbearable and unpleasant, make some reSEARCH and you’ll know what I’m talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and fits great, BUT it has came unzipped on me a few times while I was surfing and that is a big no no. I'm assuming it's because it's the poor style of Velcro put on there, because it seems to come unstrapped and then of course the zipper goes behind it. For the price you are getting a good product, other wetsuits are way pricier. So if you can deal with trying to zip your suit up a few times while your on the water then go for it, if not then bit the bullet and get something more expensive and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mine is just normal and its perfect for summer and fall surfing
customer_reviews.text: i don;t know what other review saying this wetsuit has smell.mine is just normal and its perfect for summer and fall surfing.fits perfectly and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: aristotle tuazon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wet suit! Works as expected and no complaints. The sizing guidelines are pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Oey

customer_reviews.title: This fit like it was tailored
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I couldn't find a large-tall. I'm 6'4" 175lbs. This fit like it was tailored. The suit itself is really tight in the arms and legs and neck which is what you want. I haven't had a suit fit me better than this one. The design is also awesome. I highly recommend it as it's the best one i've ever worn. I'd give more than 5 stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Subtract a few pounds from their recommendation or just order the next size up. Great suit though and fits for height and waist. I may just need a diet. :-)
customer_reviews.author: JohnnieCrunch

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'10" 165lbs. And purchased a large and it fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" 165lbs. and purchased a large and it fit perfectly. Great quality and nicely styled.
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: great wet suit!!
customer_reviews.text: Where I dive the water temp is around 74 degrees. It keeps me warm all through my dives which last around 30 to 45 minutes. The first time I tried it on the fit was really tight but after using it several times it fits like a glove and doesn't bind or impede movement. I highly recommend this suit. Have had several positive comments on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Harold W. Wilson, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bought Used from third party. Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: I am always weary of buying used products through a third party vendor on Amazon, I have been burned a few times. But this was the exception. Wet suit was practically new, no rips or tears or seam wear. Just as described and fits perfectly. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Enrique Bendrell

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bargain. I use it for surfing in north San Diego coastal, and didn't get cold during the winter months. The sizes run a bit tight, so you might want to get the next size up from the sizing chart that they provide. The zipper on the back comes undone pretty easily, so make sure you strap the neck tightly around it. Great mobility. The underarm region gets a bit chafed with mine after excessive use, but that is probably just my winter chub so I can't blame the suit ;) Great suit for 60-65 degree water, definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Maverick410

customer_reviews.title: Was perfect for me snorkeling in southern Baja in winter.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for some snorkeling around Cabo in late December. I found it very comfortable, although my wife, who also had a 3/2, was a little chilled.
customer_reviews.author: BabbChuck

customer_reviews.title: 205lbs & he says the XL is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He's 6'1", 205lbs & he says the XL is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double check sizes and it will fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I did do a lot of research to make sure i got the right size. I would go on to their website and check the size chart there just to be sure but mine fits perfect! I already have a few dives with it no problems so far!
customer_reviews.author: dude01logan

customer_reviews.title: True to size - fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not using the wetsuit until January but I wanted to leave an initial review to hopefully help people with sizing. I'm 5''10'' and 185lbs. I read some other reviews from people who were close to my size, went with the large, and I'd say it fit perfectly. It was snug without feeling restrictive. I'll update my comment after the trip to review the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Mayo

customer_reviews.title: My first wet suit and it was great.
customer_reviews.text: This suit was purchased with a gift card from a relative. It took 3 tries to get the proper fit as it seems that they are sized two sizes too small. Other than that problem I am very satisfied the the wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: David Boerner

customer_reviews.title: Chokes you a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Chokes you a bit if you're not used to it. A common complaint if you're using this for swimming in Triathlons or open water swimming events. I tried using this without practicing with it for an Olympic distance Tri and I nearly drowned. I 1000% recommend practicing with it before you use it. It fits fine other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Good feel.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Fit me to a T. I am 6'2", 205 lbs and XL fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: True to size, quality. Great for S. CA surfing husband was very happy
customer_reviews.author: C. Oosten

customer_reviews.title: Nice wetsuit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice wetsuit for the price, works like it should...just beware it smells awful! mines been airing out for about 5 months and it still has a skunky smell to it
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great product, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: I used this suit for some quality surfing time in the Baja. ZERO complaints.
customer_reviews.author: B. Y. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I’m about 6’ 170 and an xl fit me perfect. I ordered a large first and it was very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit. I am 135#, 5-6, slim build. Using the provided chart chose the extra small. I was in between sizes, but I read in other reviews that these ran small. Tight fit at the extremities, preventing a lot of water intrusion. Zipper layers and neck closure work very well also. Was able to bogie board for a couple of hours in 65 degree water. Felt refreshing. Don't try to put on when wet!
customer_reviews.author: TV Eye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wetsuit. Handles as well or better than other ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome wetsuit. Handles as well or better than other more expensive suits I have had. Zipper it well built and all seams are great. No loose strings on the stiching. Works very well in the cold southern California waters. Kept me very warm. I am 5'10'' and 180 lbs. I ordered the size 'L' and it fits perfectly. Great all around suit and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Logan S.

customer_reviews.title: Fit great! Non restrictive!
customer_reviews.text: 6' 157 slim medium fit perfectly. Went kayaking in it and didn't restrict movement. Water was 43 f and never got cold. It is snug fitting but that's how it should fit. Quality workmanship too!
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: 6'2, 165lbs, Med-Long works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wetsuit! The only thing I would really say is when you first receive it, do NOT hang up with your other clothes. The chemicals from the suit are very strong and have a "weed" smell to it. Works great in the water though. I am 6'2 and 165lbs and I got the Med Long....
customer_reviews.author: Matt Van Meeteren

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow....suit fits perfect! I am 5'7", size 40 suit coat, and about 185 lbs. Was worried about getting a LARGE size in any other wetsuit because of my height. This one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: TeamBOAH

customer_reviews.title: Fits , looks good, works.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and got what I expected. Does the thing it's designed to do. Looks pretty good. No issues with quality at least in the first summer of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Smit

customer_reviews.title: Good match on the size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Large Tall I am 205lbs 6,3 with a chest of 41 and waist of 34. Be sure to measure yourself a few different times and use the chart they have posted. Nice wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Buyer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits me perfect! I am 5'9, 160, and this fits me very well. Kept me warm in December waters while surfing, and is not too constricting for my paddling. Overall for a "cheap" wetsuit, this thing is a steal! Way better than buying a used wetsuit from Playitagain sports etc for 3/4 of the price. Just pay the extra 20$ and get yourself something that will last a long time with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug but well. I’m 5-11 and 155 lbs my wife has to help zip it up. Kept me very warm on a cold day on the lake
customer_reviews.author: GaDoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I am 5'8" 150 lbs. I got a Medium/Short sized suit.
customer_reviews.author: Sudip Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and off Very flexable. Great to have a brand new wet suit.
customer_reviews.author: Super Seven

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this wetsuit for one kiteboarding session and it tore at two different seams. I have three other wetsuits (all different thicknesses) that are still in tact after years of use! I was stuck in a remote area a Mexico for two weeks with a broken wetsuit. This is definitely a cheaply made wetsuit. I would gladly spend a little more for something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depending on neck size order at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product itself but should've ordered a xxl to get the right fit around my neck. Fits everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: DJsquared

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit lives up to the expected quality from O'Neill. I love the fit.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Zipper Design
customer_reviews.text: The Plastic Zipper design is Poorly designed. It will fail Poorly Poorly Designed.
customer_reviews.author: mmc1

customer_reviews.title: Surf’s up!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it fit perfectly and kept him nice and toasty in the cool pacific waters. It was a definite must for surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, had to trim the lower legs, did not affect performance.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: ... bought (lost the first one) and both have been great. Fits snug
customer_reviews.text: Second one I've bought (lost the first one) and both have been great. Fits snug, stays warm, and easy to move in! Great 3/2 wetsuit for the price. I see no need to buy any others when at just over $100 I can surf California every day of the year! (And I try)
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. I originally ordered an extra large would ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I originally ordered an extra large would should have fit but when it didn't I order a 2X and it did. Returned the original for a credit. Amazon has the BEST system for purchase and return!
customer_reviews.author: Harold F. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the L/S and it fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting to learn how to surf here in Southern California at age 60. So this was my first wetsuit. I'm 5'6" weighing in at 160 lbs with a 34" waist and a 40" chest. I purchased the L/S and it fits like a glove. In mid 60 degree temps I'm extremely comfortable in the water and find that I have no restricted movement whatsoever. From my limited experience if you're looking for a low cost quality suit this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'11" 200# and XL fits perfect. No quality issues as noted in a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Hit buy yesterday at 2pm and received it today at 11am. I'm 5'11" 200# and XL fits perfect. No quality issues as noted in a couple other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: What a suit! February and March might as well be June now! Love it! Cold Long Island winters are now surf season!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Deoleo

customer_reviews.title: I'll be in the water next week to provide a better opinion.
customer_reviews.text: What a pleasure that this wet suit actually fits me. I'll be in the water next week to provide a better opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's been warm in california so i dont know if i really needed this but i've loved it. It's super stretchy and comfortable. not restricting at all from what i can tell. Really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: size are too small, zipper open sometime..
customer_reviews.text: the good: makes you warm, good price, good quality the bad: zipper open after you take a wrong wave... the size chart is too small, bought at first small when I use the chart, then change it to MS, now fits good
customer_reviews.author: Dana k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Terrific wet suit. Just swam in the frigid April ocean off Assateague, VA and the suit made it very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rock

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a large in clothing but could not get this large on at all
customer_reviews.author: runnerswimmerpaddler

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a commercial diver and this suit has held up great! I've put it through the paces and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AlexDuprey

customer_reviews.title: Nice wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son to go surfing in Texas when it's still a little too cold. He loves it, very comfortable and a perfect fit. He is 6'1" 165 lbs and I bought the medium tall.
customer_reviews.author: Casey T

customer_reviews.title: Great for Whitewater Rafting !!!
customer_reviews.text: This did just what I wanted it to do. At first I was not sure if it was too tight. By the time I got in the raft to do some whitewater rafting, I knew it was a great fit. I'm very happy I got this suit. I have purchased O'neill items before so I was sure this suit would be good quality. This suit is not cheap, but then you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Requiem3k

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Many of waves caught in this suit. Works great for an east coasts surfer on those cold west coast waves.
customer_reviews.author: eMike

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to continue being on the water in shoulder seasons.
customer_reviews.text: just as advertised; good fit, right weight, easy to get into and out of, quality zipper
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a large and fit was perfect for 6'3 and 210lbs
customer_reviews.text: Read the other reviews to help decide what size to order. Ordered a large and fit was perfect for 6'3 and 210lbs. My son is happy with the wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOOKING SUIT BUT COULD NOT GET A SIZE TO ...
customer_reviews.text: GOOD LOOKING SUIT BUT COULD NOT GET A SIZE TO FIT ME THE RIGHT WAY. SENT IT BACK WITH NO PROBLEM
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I gave it a four stars but it was probably my fault. It’s too small. Need to hit the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, fits me perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, fits me perfectly. I did get a minor rub on the back of my neck so I had to play with the velcro abit to get it right. Overall great quality Spring/Summer suit
customer_reviews.author: Khemist

customer_reviews.title: my last wetsuit was a cheap low quality one so this is by far more comfortable and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: My fave wetsuit so far after 2 surf sessions in New England fall weather. Granted, my last wetsuit was a cheap low quality one so this is by far more comfortable and stretchy. I would imagine a higher end more expensive wetsuit would be even better than this. But for the price range and what I use it for, I like this one so far.
customer_reviews.author: eb

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Gets the Job Done.
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert, but it seems like very good quality to me. It fits great, just look at the fit chart contained in one of the pictures. I used it to stay warm while I swam with manatees in ~60 degree water--it kept my teeth from chattering for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good tri suit
customer_reviews.text: Used this wetsuit for a 1500 meter swim during a triathlon. Worked great, no chaffing. I'm 5'9" 170lbs and ordered the Large Short.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run small but nice wet suit
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine. Bought an XL and was much too tight. I'm 5' 10", 200#, will try an XXL when there is stock. Much less expensive than my Henderson.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked that amazon continues to sell this defective merchandise. EVERY YELP REVIEW was true. Not only the smell, the first time I tried it on , just like everyone else said.. the zipper broke and ripped the suit. Total waste of money and time waiting for it. I’d like a response from amazon. DO NOT BUY THIS ITEM
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This fits great in the upper body and arms
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fourteen year old son, 5'4" (and growing) 117lbs. This fits great in the upper body and arms. Legs are just a bit too long, but, no biggie. He is growing at a fast rate and I expect that the room will allow him to wear the suit into next winter. A 'youth' size would have been too small. Wore it surfing Christmas day. Kept him real warm. Looks great on.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good suit for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I can only comment from one 4 day diving trip so far, but I have no complaints over about 6-7 hours of dive time. I didn't notice any significant restrictions etc. Seems like a good suit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cornfield Folkie

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit, great price. I wear it 3-7 times a week and it keeps me warm in San Diego.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: It's tight getting it on and off my hands and feet but fits great once it's on.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great for me in San Salvador and Florida
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for me in San Salvador and Florida. I have not done many dives but its seems to hold up well and is comfortable. I have not had any issues with it and the price is not bad compared to others on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wetsuit for summer and winter
customer_reviews.text: Great wetsuit and just as expected , can’t go wrong with Oneil , very comfortable and fits welll Make sure to go over size chart to pick your size correctly
customer_reviews.author: ARGELIO LAGUARDIA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durability!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn mine on nearly 50 free dives with no tears and no stains. I love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Oswalt

product_meta.title: O'Neill Men's Reactor 3/2mm Back Zip Full Wetsuit
product_meta.description: The newly upgraded REACTOR-2 is engineered for performance in a value driven package. A perfect combination of stretch and durability. Fresh colors and graphics with style that's built to last.
feature_bullets: Knee panels: 52% spandex, 48% nylon; Outside right collar panel: 100% polyester; Other panels: 100% nylon; Lining: 100% neoprene
Should fit snug, but not too tight
Krypto Knee Padz.Ykk back zip system.Hidden key pocket
Care Instructions: Rinse with cool water and drip dry out of direct sunlight
